title: Bug 14047 - StyledText inefficient redraw during text change with word wrap
OB: Appending N lines to StyledText in word wrap mode results in N redraws of the entire client area.
EB: When appending N lines to StyledText in word wrap mode, the redraw should only occur for the newly added lines, rather than redrawing the entire client area for each line.
SR:
1. Set up a StyledText widget with word wrap enabled.
2. Append N lines of text to the StyledText widget.
3. Observe if the entire client area is redrawn for each line added, or if only the newly added lines are redrawn.
